summary: AN ORDINANCE related to land use and zoning, amending Chapter 23.48 of the Seattle Municipal Code; creating new SM/D 40-85 and SM/D 40-65 zoning classifications; adopting an affordable housing incentive program for increased height in areas zoned SM/D 40-85 or SM/D 40-65; and amending the Official Land Use Map at pages 72-73 to rezone land in the West Dravus commercial area to SM/D 40-85 and SM/D 40-65 contingent upon the creation of a Local Improvement District to finance transportation improvements.
